text: Son in Law is a 1993 American romantic comedy movie. It was directed by Steve Rash and was produced by Peter M. Lenkov and Michael Rotenberg. Son in Law was released on July 2, 1993. The movie starred Pauly Shore. The movie gained negative reviews from critics and holds a 12% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. Michael Wilmington of the Los Angeles Times said that the movie was trying to be a comedy version of Guess Who's Coming to Dinner even thorugh the main character is genuinely a jerk. == Cast == * Pauly Shore as Fred/"Crawl" * Carla Gugino as Rebecca "Becca" Warner * Lane Smith as Walter Warner * Cindy Pickett as Connie Warner * Mason Adams as Walter Warner, Sr. * Patrick Renna as Zack Warner * Tiffani Thiessen as Tracy * Dan Gauthier as Travis * Dennis Burkley as Theo * Brendan Fraser as Link (uncredited) ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1993 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Steve Rash Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in South Dakota
title: Son in Law
